summary: The Magic Drauger Bow enhanced and made forgable, smithable & enchantable. NO DLCs REQUIRED. Works on SKYRIM 1.6.89.0.6
descriptionHtml:
I asked my wife Denise what she would like to see in the game and she said a bow that was light and powerful for new players to use. Something better than a hunting bow. So I searched the bows in the game and found the \"Magic Draugr Bow\" that can only be obtained by finding just the right Draugr someplace I can\'t remember. So I thought THIS needs to be brought to the forge for her and others to enjoy easily. 

Q: What\'s so special about it? 
A: It won\'t disappear on you and doesn\'t require a spell to summon it. 
-All you need is some ECTOPLASM (1,2 or3) & the ARCANE SMITHING PERK (level 60+) to make this item UNLESS you download the Special Edition that has the Spectral Smithing Perk which only requires a level 25. I naturally have brought the arrows along with it to complete the package but have made them a separate MOD so you can have them the same way as the bow but only if you want them.
-The bows draw speed has been increased by 2x as this is a Spectral bow with nearly no weight = What draw resistance?  
-The Critical Hit Chance is higher. 
-The Stagger is Higher. 
-The range is as high as is usable.
-Craftable at the FORGE under the NEW DRAUGR section.
-Now available in 3 power levels.

Special Edition:
I added a NEW PERK in the PERK TREE (Spectral Smithing) for the Bow & Arrows to make them smithable at a lower smithing level (Level 25)...that makes sense for what the bow is, as it\'s not a normal material. Be sure to disable the separate versions of the Bow & Arrows to avoid duplicate items.

If you like this MOD then please ENDORSE it check out my other MODs :-)
Follow me on FACEBOOK Six6StarStudios

Whiterun Archery Shop - skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37130
Better Breezehome Basement - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36235
Incendiary Arrows http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34104 
Denise Spectral Arrows - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34532
Basic Silverware - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34533
Smithing Gear  - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34654
Pay Bounty BAT Files - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35099
author: Six6Star
